Package org.zaproxy.zap.extension.users

Class ContextUserAuthManager

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.extension.users.ContextUserAuthManager
public class ContextUserAuthManager extends Object
The Manager that handles all the information related to Users, Roles and authentications corresponding to a particular Context.

    • setUsers

      public void setUsers(List<User> users)
      Sets a new list of users for this context. An internal copy of the provided list is stored.
      Parameters:
      users - the users
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - (since 2.8.0) if any of the given users is null.
